name: capstone-project-template
description: Web application "Online Learning Platform" using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
author: Dmytro Gutorka

scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/fonts && cp -r src/assets/fonts/* dist/fonts/ && cp -r src/assets/js dist/js && cp -r src/assets/images dist/images
scripts.build: npm run compile:sass && npm run copy:assets
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch:sass & live-server --open=src
